title: Head of Marketing Job at straitPay
content:
straitPay is a fin-tech company on a mission to make spending & investing in Africa a lot easier and convenient for anyone interested in Africa. We believe that there is a lot of potential on the African continent, which is why at Straitpay - We believe in Africa. We are a Fin-tech company, on a mission to make spending & investment in Africa a lot easier and convenient for anyone interested in Africa. You can be a part of this exciting journey, and make a difference in the African fintech space.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of Marketing

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a strategic, creative, and results-oriented Head of Marketing to develop and execute country-specific marketing strategies that align with the overall group objectives.
	This role is critical in building and maintaining straitPay as a strong and recognizable brand.
	The Head of Marketing will be responsible for managing both digital and offline marketing campaigns, driving growth in key products, leading a talented marketing team, and ensuring effective communication of our brand message.


Key Responsibilities
Strategy:


	Develop a comprehensive marketing strategy for straitPay; with a major focus on the African market.
	Defining straitPay's marketing and sales budget and expenditure (budget allocation and spend).


Branding:


	Ensuing that there’s a standardized and recognizable logo.
	Ensuring that the company has brand guidelines and that anyone working on creatives internally and externally adheres to: the colors, logo placement, brand tone.
	Controlling when, how and where the company's merchandise is deployed.
	Defining and managing the brand communication strategy using a variety of channels.
	Owning the development and messaging of the brand narrative.
	Creating, executing, and managing marketing programs and campaigns.
	Staying current on market trends and competitive activity.


Corporate Communication:


	Controlling the narrative and ensuring there’s consistency in brand tone in internal and external communications.
	Developing and implementing marketing and communications campaigns and strategies and monitoring their success
	Defining KPIs for each communications channel which will indicate a campaign's level of success
	Determining strategic communications campaigns that will help further organizational goals
	Creating internal communications protocols and initiatives that will foster employee morale
	Overseeing the creation of marketing and communications collateral to ensure that it is consistent with the organization's brand, including white papers, website copy, and more
	Writing and delivering internal newsletter on a monthly basis
	Representing the organization at events and press conferences
	Reaching out to influencers, media and beyond in order to arrange story placement on a national and global level.


Digital Marketing & Content Creation:


	Collaborating with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience.
	Planning and executing all web, SEO/SEM, database marketing, email, social media, and display advertising campaigns.
	Designing, building, and maintaining the company's social media presence.
	Measuring and reporting performance of all digital marketing campaigns and assessing against goals ROI and KPIs).
	Identifying trends and insights and optimizing spend and performance based on insights.
	Utilizing strong, analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points.
	Identifying critical conversion points and drop off points and optimizing user funnels.
	Brainstorming new and creative growth strategies through digital marketing.
	Planning, executing, and measuring experiments and conversion tests.
	Collaborating with agencies and other vendor partners.
	Evaluating emerging technologies.


Public Relations:


	Commissioning or undertaking relevant market research.
	Planning publicity strategies and campaigns.
	Writing and producing presentations and press releases.
	Dealing with enquiries from the public, the press, and related organisations.
	Organising and attending promotional events such as press conferences, open days, exhibitions, tours and visits.
	Speaking publicly at interviews, press conferences and presentations.
	Providing management and investors with information about new promotional opportunities and current PR campaigns progress.
	Analysing media coverage.
	Liaising with investors, managerial and journalistic staff about budgets, timescales and objectives.


Team Leadership & Collaboration:


	Lead, mentor, and motivate a high-performing marketing team.
	Foster a collaborative working environment with other departments to ensure the successful implementation of marketing strategies.
	Manage external vendors and partners to ensure high-quality execution of marketing campaigns.


Qualifications & Experience


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications in a related field.
	8 - 10 years of experience in marketing, with a strong focus on the Fintech, and financial services sector.
	Proven track record in developing and executing successful marketing strategies/campaigns.
	Strong experience in brand management, digital marketing, content creation.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage effectively with internal and external stakeholders.
	Strong understanding of public relations and media management.
	A results-driven mindset with a focus on ROI and measurable outcomes.


Desired Skills:


	Experience in the fintech or financial services industry is highly preferred.
	A deep understanding of digital marketing tools and platforms (social media, Search Engine Optimization - SEO, Search Engine Marketing - SEM, email marketing, etc.).
	Ability to think creatively and strategically to drive growth and brand awareness.
	Ability to independently come up with new ideas, develop strategies, and take initiative to execute them.
	Strong analytical skills with the ability to assess campaign performance and adjust strategies as needed.
	Proven experience managing events and building partnerships to enhance brand presence.


Why Join Us?


	Competitive compensation and benefits.
	Be part of a fast-growing fintech transforming financial access in Africa.
	Work in a dynamic and innovative environment with global exposure.
	A mission-driven company where your work directly contributes to empowering Africans worldwide.
	Join us and play a key role in building a compliant and trusted financial ecosystem!

title: Bancassurance Executive Job at Dunn And Braxton Limited

title: Operational Specialist Job at Felton Energy Services Limited
content:
Felton Energy Services Limited (FESL) is an indigenous oil & gas procurement, operation and maintenance company in Nigeria. The company was established to supply global customers with Electrical, Mechanical, Industrial and Engineering Products, on time and at the most competitive prices. FESL has unrivalled commitment to the Oil & Gas Industry and has gained support of the leading manufacturers which ensures our solutions are at the forefront oftoday’s technology.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operational Specialist

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers

About the Role
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking highly experienced Operational Specialist to support the delivery of job instructions, simulation-based training, and competency development for both new and experienced senior operations personnel.
	This is a strategic role requiring a high level of technical knowledge, instructional capability, and operational experience to drive excellence in plant operations and workforce development.
	The Company is a Gas Manufacturing Company engaged in the production of Liquefied Natural Gas. It is a business based in Bonny Island, Rivers State, Nigeria.


Key Responsibilities
Training & Instructional Delivery:


	Deliver job instructions and plant-specific operational training to operations personnel in alignment with the NLNG Operations Assessment and Progression scheme.
	Conduct simulation-based training and assessments to build and validate critical operational competencies.
	Develop learning materials, manuals, and structured on-the-job training guides.
	Provide coaching and mentoring to operations personnel, fostering safe and efficient plant operations.


Operations Competency Development:


	Evaluate technical proficiency and readiness of personnel for progression to higher roles, including Field Operators and Console Operators.
	Develop tailored development plans for operators, based on individual performance assessments and progression requirements.
	Ensure competency development aligns with organizational standards, best practices, and HSE requirements.


Plant Operations Support:


	Provide subject matter expertise in LNG processing plant operations, including startup, shutdown, emergency handling, and routine operations.
	Support the standardization of operational procedures and best practices across teams.
	Collaborate with technical teams to integrate operational feedback into plant reliability and performance improvements.


Performance Monitoring & Reporting:


	Track progress of personnel competency development and prepare performance reports for management.
	Maintain detailed records of training activities, simulations, and progression evaluations.
	Support audits and reviews related to training and competence assurance.


Required Qualifications


	HND/Bachelor’s Degree in Chemical Engineering, Process Engineering, or related discipline.
	Relevant certifications in instructional delivery, operations training, or LNG plant operations are a strong advantage.


Required Experience:


	Minimum of 10 –15 years of operational experience in the LNG industry.
	Proven experience in both Field Operations and Console (DCS) roles.
	Prior experience delivering training or mentoring in an industrial operations environment is a strong advantage.


Desired Skills & Competencies:


	Strong instructional and facilitation skills in technical and operational training.
	Ability to evaluate and build competencies in a structured, measurable manner.
	Excellent communication, coaching, and interpersonal skills.
	Proficiency in developing and using simulation tools for operations training.
	Strong commitment to safety, process discipline, and continuous improvement.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: wendy@feltonenergy.net using "Operations Specialist" as the subject of the email.

Note: Be sure to attach all relevant certifications and indicate your desired daily pay rate.

title: Quality Control & Compliance Officer Job at Toasties Limited
content:
Toasties Limited is a fast-casual dining restaurant chain located in Lagos, Nigeria. We specialize in hot toasted fusion sandwiches and offer a range of specials. Our focus is to bring out-of-the-box meal selections to Lagos’ on-the-go consumer. Using quality ingredients and efficient service, Toasties aims to put variety, creativity and great tasting products in the hands of every customer!

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Quality Control & Compliance Officer

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Quality Assurance: Regularly monitor food preparation and presentation to ensure consistency, taste, and quality meet restaurant standards.
	Compliance Monitoring: Ensure that all operations, from kitchen procedures to customer service, comply with local, state, and federal health and safety regulations.
	Health & Safety Standards: Conduct routine audits to verify food safety practices (temperature control, storage, handling, sanitation) and ensure compliance with food safety certifications and regulations
	Training & Development: Provide training and ongoing support to staff on quality control processes, food safety, and health regulations.
	Process Improvement: Identify opportunities for improving food quality, service consistency, and operational efficiency, and collaborate with management to implement changes.
	Supplier Compliance: Ensure that all vendors and suppliers meet the restaurant's quality and compliance standards, including food sourcing and delivery practices.
	Record Keeping & Documentation: Maintain accurate records of inspections, audits, and compliance-related activities for reporting and traceability.
	Customer Feedback: Monitor guest feedback related to food quality and service to identify areas for improvement and ensure customer satisfaction.
	Crisis Management: Address any quality-related issues or food safety incidents promptly and effectively, working to resolve problems and prevent future occurrences.


Qualifications


	Proven experience in quality control, compliance, or food safety roles, preferably within the restaurant or food service industry.
	Strong knowledge of food safety regulations, health codes, and quality control standards (e.g., HACCP, ServSafe).
	Excellent attention to detail with the ability to identify areas for improvement and take corrective actions.
	Strong communication skills to effectively train staff and communicate with management and external agencies.
	Ability to perform audits, inspections, and assessments with a focus on continuous improvement.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
	Strong organizational and time-management skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@biscuitboneblog.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Restaurant Support Team Member Job at Toasties Limited
content:
Toasties Limited is a fast-casual dining restaurant chain located in Lagos, Nigeria. We specialize in hot toasted fusion sandwiches and offer a range of specials. Our focus is to bring out-of-the-box meal selections to Lagos’ on-the-go consumer. Using quality ingredients and efficient service, TOASTIES aims to put variety, creativity and great tasting products in the hands of every customer!

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Support Team Member

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a dynamic Restaurant Support Team Memberto join our team and play a key role in delivering exceptional dining experiences.
	You will support both front-of-house and kitchen operations, assisting with customer service, food preparation, and ensuring cleanliness and high standards of quality throughout the restaurant.
	Your attention to detail, passion for quality, and commitment to freshness will be vital in maintaining the high standards that our guests expect and our restaurant is known for.


Key Responsibilities


	Customer Service: Provide outstanding service to guests, ensuring a welcoming, friendly, and professional dining experience.
	Kitchen Support: Assist with food preparation, cooking, and maintaining cleanliness in the kitchen, adhering to food safety standards.
	Quality & Safety: Uphold high standards of food quality, taste, and food safety to ensure each dish meets restaurant specifications.
	Team Collaboration: Work closely with both front-of-house and kitchen teams to ensure smooth operations, efficient service, and a positive dining experience for customers.
	Cleanliness & Maintenance: Ensure all areas of the restaurant, including dining spaces, kitchen, and restrooms, are clean, organized, and well-maintained at all times.
	Timely Service: Assist in ensuring that orders are prepared and delivered to guests in a timely and efficient manner, with attention to detail.


Qualifications


	Previous experience in food service or restaurant operations.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to provide excellent customer service.
	Ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment while maintaining attention to detail.
	Knowledge of basic food safety practices and the ability to maintain cleanliness in the kitchen.
	Positive attitude, reliability, and ability to work well with others.
	Flexibility to assist in different areas of the restaurant as needed.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@biscuitboneblog.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
